attributes.action: ensure that before he allows the Chancellor of the Exchequer to increase tax rates for the taxpaying public he removes the tax free status of elected members of the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpaying public continues to fund (under threat of criminalisation) the profligate lives of our elected representatives and it is particularly reprehensible that they have been allowed to vote themselves a tax free regime of allowances which is extreme in its disdain of the people who fund it.  Before WE pay more in taxes our elected representatives MUST be required to pay tax on what they already get.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
